turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Solo garlic.
turn.2: Solo garlic Solo garlic, also known as single clove garlic, monobulb garlic, single bulb garlic, or pearl garlic, is a type of "Allium sativum" (garlic).
turn.3: Is there anything else interesting about this?
turn.4: The size of the single clove differs from approximately 25 to 50 mm in diameter.
turn.5: Do they have any other names?
turn.6: It has the flavour of the garlic clove but is somewhat milder and slightly perfumed.
turn.8: The appearance is somewhat akin to that of a pickling onion, with white skin and often purple stripes.
turn.9: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.10: Solo garlic offers the advantage, compared to traditional garlic, of being very quick and easy to peel.
turn.12: Small bulbs of solo garlic can be obtained by planting the bulbils of any variety of garlic.
